parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Effects</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>serverExec</name>=<value> server </value></part><part><name>Server Execution</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Time </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr2</name>=<value> Mission Information </value></part><part><name>GROUP2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr3</name>=<value> Multiplayer </value></part><part><name>GROUP3</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Sets the estimated time left in the game that is shown in the "Game in progress" screen or in the master browser.
<template lineStart="1"><title>Informative </title><part><name index="1"/><value> This command will force the server to broadcast [[serverTime]] to all clients without waiting for the next broadcast window (usually every 5 minutes).</value></part></template> </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[estimatedTimeLeft]] seconds </value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> seconds: [[Number]] - estimated time in seconds (maximum 36000 (10 hours) since <template><title>GVI</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.69</value></part></template>, 7200 (2 hours) before) </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[estimatedTimeLeft]] 600; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>10 min</value></part></template></code> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>x2</name>=<value> '''OFP:''' for missions with a hard set limit adjusted via ''[[Description.ext#titleParam.25.2C_valuesParam.25.2C_defValueParam.25.2C_textParam.25|param1]]'', the following example can be used in the [[Event Scripts|init.sqs]] file:
<code>[[estimatedTimeLeft]] param1;</code></value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE2</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[estimatedEndServerTime]], [[serverTime]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>
</value></part></template>
